Testimonials.name: Siyamanga Zweni
Testimonials.description: Rabia is an exceptional learner with a keen eye for detail, She is also an excellent team player who always goes above and beyond to support her fellow students. Her smile always brightens up the room . She is warm and loving. Her determination and willingness to collaborate makes her a valuable asset to any project team. I have no doubt that she will continue to excel in her career and make meaningful contributions to the field of technology.

Testimonials.name: Justin Scholtz
Testimonials.description: Rabia is a very cheerful person, always looking help those around her and a very quick learner. These are qualities that makes her the perfect candidate for any team, I've noticed that once her mind is set on learning something or just understanding a concept then her determination just kicks into another level and she doesn't stop until it clicks. Definitely the type of person I want around my team

Testimonials.name: Uthmaan Samsodien
Testimonials.description: For the past 2 months I've learnt a lot about Rabia, she is determined, focused and wants to get things done. She is always asking questions making sure she understands the work. When working in a group she is an excellent co-worker and when she is working alone she is focused and does not procrastinate. She is strong is HTML and CSS always eager to learn and to upskill herself. She is very organized and this is a good quality to have in an working environment. Rabia is kind and is good with working with people.

Testimonials.name: Summer De Wet
Testimonials.description: Rabia is a very hard working and dedicated person, when she sets her mind to something, she gets it done. Beyond her technical skills, Rabia is a very kind person who offers her assistance to anyone who needs it. Her ability to work collaboratively makes her an invaluable member of any team. I would definitely recommend her because not only will she be an asset to the team, but her work ethics and passion for technology would serve her well in any role.

Testimonials.name: Imraan Berknsen
Testimonials.description: I am delighted to recommend Rabia as an aspiring web developer. Her hardworking and dedicated nature is evident in the exceptional websites she creates. Rabia's creative and stylish approach to web development ensures that her work always looks modern and visually appealing. I have no doubt that Rabia will continue to excel in her field, and I highly recommend her to anyone in need of a talented web developer.

Education.title: High School
Education.description: For the first three years of high school was a average student but grade 11 and I pushed enough to get decent marks.As for matric I become the top student and manage to get first place in most of my subject and was valedictorian and got first place in my whole grade.I am impressed I passed with a bachelors pass aswell.

Education.title: Boot Camp
Education.description: I recently started at Life Choices and It's really been a enjoyable experience and I'm ready to make coding a life time career.

Skills.description: HTML is a very straightforward language to learn and is incredibly easy to use, even for beginners. With only a basic understanding of HTML, you can create webpages with ease.

Skills.title: CSS
Skills.description: CSS is an incredibly easy language to learn, with its simple syntax and straightforward rules. It is a great language for beginners to web development, as it can be picked up quickly and put into practice with tangible results.

JavaScript is a surprisingly easy language to learn, with its intuitive syntax and straightforward concepts. It can be picked up quickly by beginners, making it an ideal choice for those looking to get into coding.

Bootstrap is an incredibly easy-to-use language, making it a great choice for developers of all skill levels. With its intuitive syntax, creating responsive websites and apps with Bootstrap has never been simpler.
